meanings.definition: Covering a surface with small, closely set tiles or stones.
meanings.sent1: The tesselated floor sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The bathroom walls were tesselated with colorful tiles.
meanings.sent3: The tesselated patio looked like a giant puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was a tesselated masterpiece of design.
meanings.sent5: The artist's tesselated artwork mesmerized all who saw it.

meanings.definition: Having a checkered or mosaic pattern.
meanings.sent1: The tesselated quilt kept her warm on cold nights.
meanings.sent2: The old building had a tesselated roof that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent3: The tesselated cake was almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: His tesselated tie clashed with his striped shirt.
meanings.sent5: The garden path was tesselated with colorful stones, creating a beautiful pattern.

meanings.definition: Formed or arranged in a checkered or mosaic pattern.
meanings.sent1: The tesselated design on the wall added a modern touch to the room.
meanings.sent2: The tesselated pattern on the floor made it easy to navigate.
meanings.sent3: The tesselated puzzle was challenging to put together.
meanings.sent4: The tesselated arrangement of flowers in the garden was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The tesselated mosaic on the ceiling depicted a scene from ancient times.
